scripts.combine-frontend-js: node -e "const glob = require('glob'); const fs = require('fs'); const files = glob.sync('assets/src/frontend/js/*.js'); if (files.length > 0) { const concatenated = files.map(file => fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8')).join('\n'); fs.writeFileSync('assets/build/frontend/js/temp_frontend_combined.js', concatenated); console.log('Frontend JavaScript files concatenated.'); } else { console.log('No frontend JavaScript files found. Skipping concatenation.'); }"
scripts.minify-frontend-js: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const terser = require('terser'); if (fs.existsSync('assets/build/frontend/js/temp_frontend_combined.js')) { const code = fs.readFileSync('assets/build/frontend/js/temp_frontend_combined.js', 'utf8'); const minified = terser.minify(code); if (minified.error) { console.error('Error during minification:', minified.error); process.exit(1); } else if (minified.code) { fs.writeFileSync('assets/build/frontend/js/scripts.min.js', minified.code); fs.unlinkSync('assets/build/frontend/js/temp_frontend_combined.js'); console.log('Frontend JavaScript files minified.'); } else { console.log('No frontend JavaScript files found. Skipping minification.'); } } else { console.log('No frontend JavaScript files found. Skipping minification.'); }"
scripts.build-frontend: npm run build-frontend-scss && npm run combine-frontend-css && npm run minify-frontend-css && npm run combine-frontend-js && npm run minify-frontend-js && npm run copy-frontend-php && npm run copy-frontend-images
scripts.combine-admin-scss: node-sass --output-style expanded assets/src/admin/scss/ -o assets/temp/admin/css/ && concat assets/temp/admin/css/*.css > assets/src/admin/css/style.css && rimraf assets/temp/admin
scripts.minify-admin-js: for file in assets/src/admin/js/*.js; do terser "$file" --compress --mangle --output "assets/build/admin/js/$(basename $file)"; done
scripts.build-admin: npm run build-admin-scss && npm run combine-admin-css && npm run minify-admin-css && npm run combine-admin-scss && npm run minify-admin-js && npm run copy-admin-php && npm run copy-admin-images
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin
scripts.start-frontend: concurrently "nodemon --watch assets/src/frontend/scss/ --ext scss --exec 'npm run build-frontend'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/frontend/js/ --ext js --exec 'npm run build-frontend'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/frontend/php/ --ext php --exec 'npm run build-frontend'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/frontend/images/ --exec 'npm run build-frontend'"
scripts.start-admin: concurrently "nodemon --watch assets/src/admin/scss/ --ext scss --exec 'npm run build-admin'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/admin/js/ --ext js --exec 'npm run build-admin'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/admin/php/ --ext php --exec 'npm run build-admin'" "nodemon --watch assets/src/admin/images/ --exec 'npm run build-admin'"
